name: MUSEUM
description:
'Museum' is a short puzzle game saga developed by 'Wreck Tangle Games'. The game follows 'Todd Trainer', the security guy at The Royal Foyer Museum in England.

As Todd wakes up from a quick snooze he notices all the security cameras around the Museum have been powered off, it's up to Todd to get the cameras back online and solve the mysteries surrounding the Museum.



'Volume I' consists of 4 exhibits, each relating to Ancient Civilisations - Hellada (Ancient Greece), Ancient Egypt, Roma and an Aztec exhibit.
